page.title: 16Les Landes School.
page.content: The Juniors building was built in 1902.The Infants building was built in 1952. The hall was built in 1979. The grounds are 391 square metres. In 1985 there were 112 children in the school. There were 47 girls and 54 boys. Les Landes school is made out of granite as are most old Jersey buildings. There are 6 teachers at Les Landes and 5 classes. We did a survey of mums and dads working in St. Ouen and St. Helier. 54 parents work in St. Ouen and 26 work in St. Helier. We asked them if their mums or dads work in farming, banking, tourism or work for the States of Jersey as these are the main sources of employment in Jersey. Four of them do banking,twenty five do States work and twenty seven do farming.
